Author: LIQNET_official
Title: [ANN][ICO] LIQNET is a cryptoexchange solves the problem of market fragmentation
Body: Done: - Letter code of the token on the exchange: LEN - Standard: ERC20 - The maximum number of tokens (provided that all tokens will be sold in the first three days): 63,746,032. After the PreICO, the number of tokens issued can be recalculated depending on bonuses and fees. - The price of one LEN token is $1 - Payment options: ETH, BTC, BCH, ZEC, LTC, XRP, Waves - During the ICO, the required number of tokens will be created automatically. - Link to the ICO website: http://liqnet.com/. After registration, the participants will have the address of the smart contract. - The mechanism for destroying tokens: the unused tokens are destroyed using the mechanism described in the smart contract. Quote from: onebtcforlife on August 01, 2018, 06:38:09 AM Quote from: Noruka on July 31, 2018, 08:43:37 PM Quote from: LIQNET_official on July 19, 2018, 02:09:25 PM Quote from: Noruka on July 19, 2018, 01:07:19 PM Quote from: LIQNET_official on July 17, 2018, 11:12:21 AM Quote from: XcalibuRRR on July 17, 2018, 10:40:14 AM Quote from: YangsT on July 17, 2018, 09:54:27 AM Quote from: Razhabov on July 17, 2018, 08:23:48 AM Quote from: Imhotepp on July 17, 2018, 08:01:14 AM And when will be the launch of the platform allowing to trade third party tokens? I have heard that is will start in the end of 2018 or at the beginning of 2019. Oh it will be very great. It will help the project to develop and it can bring new life to all other parts of it. I am waiting for it. And have you heard something about the merchant acquiring device? I have heard that it will be great. Its launch will be on Q2 2019. Quote from: Noruka on July 17, 2018, 10:55:04 AM Quote from: LIQNET_official on July 16, 2018, 04:24:53 PM Quote from: NailS100 on July 16, 2018, 04:18:02 PM What are the main economical advantages of the project? It is very interesting for me. The main economical advantages of liqnet exchange: - Ability to execute a big order at the best price (large market depth) - Minimal spreads - Ability to trade large volumes without the risk of shifting the market - Best prices, minimal spreads, and the biggest volumes all in one place  There are also limits to the advantages you mentioned right? Imagine there comes a huge whale to your exchange and buys a billion dollars worth of Bitcoin, that's going to affect the market I'd expect? Quote from: IlidaN on July 17, 2018, 11:10:33 AM I have heard nothing about it but I want to know more. I want to know more about all the important parts of this project because I am very interested in it. Good question! Of course, this will affect the market. But if the rest of the stock exchange this action could collapse, then liqunet will purchase the necessary volume on several exchanges, which does not warp the skewed one big deal.  That requires a very fast trading engine for your setup to make that all work in real time if huge trades need to be executed!  At the moment, at the most simple equipment we have 18000-20000 transactions per second, if necessary, the core easily scales into several servers and the productivity can be increased by an order of magnitude.  I have no clue how many transactions these large exchanges right now process per second, but 18000-20000 sounds about ok I guess.  Nobody has any clue about this transaction because trasnaction are ananomous which we can identify but admin can easily identify through back ground process. I think i am expecting more than 18000 -20000  and it might be more. As I have written above, we can do more if needed.

Author: LIQNET_official
Title: [ANN][ICO] LIQNET is a cryptoexchange solves the problem of market fragmentation
Body: We grateful for your support and believing in our project! It is much important for us!  Quote from: lilaj4de on July 29, 2018, 01:51:20 AM In the case of exchange, you will be asked to validate the data for transactions that are high, such as making withdrawals of $ 20,000 before KYC is required?  The first safeguard against money laundering is sophisticated Know Your Client (KYC) verification. To ensure compliance with standart AML regulations, you may find that you are requested to confirm your identiti, proof of residence and provide some personal details. LIQNET has put in place a dedicated system of the identity verification of our clients which ensures the safety and security of both your LIQNET account and the entire LIQNET services.  Whenever you are going to withdraw money in fiat and crypto currencies of deposit fiat currencies you could be asked to confirm your identity. While our identity verificatin systems are designed to minimize any inconvenience for you, the verification process may take several days to complete.

Author: LIQNET_official
Title: [ANN][ICO] LIQNET is a cryptoexchange solves the problem of market fragmentation
Body: Hello! Yeah, this is quite enough, and if necessary, the core easily scales into several servers and the productivity can be increased by an order of magnitude. Quote from: boranes on July 31, 2018, 08:49:47 PM I was reading whitepaper and I have to say I don't understand most things what I have read. How do you plan to solve problem of market fragmentation? This looks like win-win situation for everyone, everyone who invest in ICO will make profit, sounds so unrealistic and too good to be truth. Hi You can always ask questions if you feel that you do not understand something about the project! We are here to help So, let me explain to you: LIQNET is a cryptoexchange, which allows to unite liquidity from different platforms and solve the problem of scattering of users, their trading requests, and orders, thus forming a unified order book with better market depth and better prices for private persons and legal entities from various jurisdictions. What makes the LIQNET exchange unique is the LEN (Liquidity Exchange Network) tool, which allows to collect and combine orders of our exchange's clients and orders from third-party platforms into a single order package and make them available for trading by all LIQNET's clients. LIQNET also provides a suite of order types to help our customer optimize their trading strategy. Btw, our exchange is already working in a test mode. Check it please liqnet.com Quote from: ineedbdolar on July 31, 2018, 08:53:58 PM An interesting idea of the organization, there are tremendous prospects in the future, both the goods they take, and the coins, which must show tremendous growth in trade. Hopefully be the best project, great and professional team. Hey, we are grateful for your feedback, support and wishes! It means a lot to us!

Author: LIQNET_official
Title: [ANN][ICO] LIQNET is a cryptoexchange solves the problem of market fragmentation
Body: Let me clarify you the security methods we use: The first security layer is different locations. Also we use hdd encryption and 2FA to access the server as the second security layer. The third one is that we grant access only for two co-founders. Also we store a part of our assets on different exchanges which connected to LEN. Our cold wallets have multi sign. And the last thing is that the background clearing will notice the first successful transaction and will transfer all assets in the cold wallets.

Body: Quote from: Monopoli$T on July 27, 2018, 03:02:10 PM   It's fine, but what do you think about the immediate prospects of this project. Quote from: DyxLEzz on July 27, 2018, 03:59:08 PM I expect growth, but I can not be sure of its size. The exchange`s value will be determined in accordance with the demand and supply for it. Our team has done calculations of competitors' profits. Nine largest exchanges were taken for calculations. Average monthly trading volume was calculated, which was equal to $46 228 934 670. The forecasted value of the volume of trading positions from third-party platforms — 25%, and the percentage of revenues from arbitrage percent getting is 0,3%. Thus, the share of cross positions equals to $34 671 701 002. Also, a midline development scenario was calculated, for which the level of exchange's trading volume was set to $350 000 000, and the size of trading positions from third-party platforms was equal to 70%. For these numbers, the share of cross positions will equal to $105 000 000. Due to the platform aggregating sufficient amount of liquidity of different tools, it is planned to implement trading of deliverable futures and options for those that have the highest liquidity. For more details check please our WP (p.8-9) https://liqnet.io/static/docs/Liqnet_WhitePaper_en.pdf

Author: MoNeY TrEE
Title: [ANN][ICO] LIQNET is a cryptoexchange solves the problem of market fragmentation
Body: It is interesting to ask whether this project has any disadvantages if you compare it with other projects?

Author: LIQNET_official
Title: [ANN][ICO] LIQNET is a cryptoexchange solves the problem of market fragmentation
Body: Liquidity for the LIQNET exchange is collected both by classical methods and by a separate mechanism based on the LEN technology of our own design. The LEN mechanism (Liquidity Exchange Network) collects and consolidates LIQNET exchange clients orders and orders from third-party platforms into a single order book and makes them available for trading to all LIQNET clients.  Quote from: MoNeY TrEE on July 25, 2018, 04:31:13 PM It is interesting to ask whether this project has any disadvantages if you compare it with other projects?  Several categories represent the competitive environment of LIQNET: 1. Classic cryptocurrency exchanges with which LIQNET works as a client by using the LEN mechanism. It connects to them through an API and executes a significant number of trading operations thus increasing the competitor's turnover and pays fees for every operation, therefore, making profits for the competitor. 2. Forex brokers who are offering to trade the BTC-USD and other cryptocurrencies pairs. They are not considered direct competitors because they work with non-deliverable CFD contracts on the price difference. Cryptocurrency can be bought from them, but it can't be withdrawn. 3. B2BX project. It is not an aggregator of real cryptocurrency liquidity. It would be more proper to consider it as an offer to brokers to implement trading of contracts on the difference between prices in BTC and ETH, an attempt to connect brokers and their clients, who trade to lower the brokers' risks of changing prices of cryptocurrencies. Because non-covered risks will have to be covered on the markets with an actual shipment of assets anyway, LIQNET will be the best solution for that. In other words, B2BX is not a competitor, but LIQNET's potential client. 4. Futures contracts from CME Group, CBOE.  A futures contract on Bitcoin index put on the market is not a competitor to LIQNET. If the possibility of an arbitrage appears, traders need a place to buy or sell the base asset. Because the index is calculated based on the data from four cryptoexchanges, each of which is a supplier of liquidity, LIQNET is the optimal platform for that, because it provides the maximum volume of liquidity for the best price. Therefore, the issue of futures leads to the increase of the number of traders, who want to trade physical assets at the LIQNET platform. As you can see, LIQNET has not any disadvantages, if you compare it with other projects.

Author: Garag
Title: [ANN][ICO] LIQNET is a cryptoexchange solves the problem of market fragmentation
Body: Hello, how is your project implemented fraud protection?

Author: LIQNET_official
Title: [ANN][ICO] LIQNET is a cryptoexchange solves the problem of market fragmentation
Body: Hey  Nice to here! Thank you. Quote from: Garag on July 25, 2018, 05:32:40 PM Hello, how is your project implemented fraud protection? Hello! So, I`ll explain it for you: The server side of the LIQNET platform is a private cloud, which is composed of physical servers in several locations and client terminals (currently, one terminal for web browsers). The security of the server side has been thoroughly tested. To ensure the security of user data and tools, we implemented the following protective measures: - two-step authentication; - system of replicated geo-distributed servers with the possibility of scaling; - geo-distributed array of hot, conditionally hot, cold wallets, as well as addresses with a multisignature for each cryptocurrency; - a background clearing system that checks the correctness of current balances and I/Os between full cross-sections, and when a discrepancy registers a dangerous state, it transfers funds to cold wallets and multisignature addresses.

Title: [ANN][ICO] LIQNET is a cryptoexchange solves the problem of market fragmentation
Body: The difference from other exchanges is that liquidity for the LIQNET exchange is collected both by classical methods and by a separate mechanism based on the LEN technology of our own design. The LEN mechanism (Liquidity Exchange Network) collects and consolidates LIQNET exchange clients orders and orders from third-party platforms into a single order book and makes them available for trading to all LIQNET clients. Other advantages of LIQNET: 1.Desktop apps (own desktop app, MultiCharts, TradingView, and MT5). 2.Fully functional mobile trading apps for Android and iOS. 3.An online-wallet project that provides the ability to exchange cryptocurrencies and fiat money by the press of a button. Additionally, it has the easy cryptocurrency investment service with free and paid built-in strategies. 4.Acquiring service for receiving payments in cryptocurrencies that provides sellers with many capabilities and protects from many risks. Body: Arbitrage trading is multiple logically related transactions aimed at extracting profit from the difference in prices for identical or related assets at the same time in different markets (spatial arbitration) or in the same market at different times (temporary arbitration, ordinary exchange speculation). This will mean an increase in the turnover rate. Thank you for your opinion and responses! Quote from: DyxLEzz on July 24, 2018, 03:15:46 PM What other factors can cause the growth rate? I would like to know more about this The market of cryptocurrency exchange is tightly bound to the cryptocurrencies themselves. It is at the early stage of its development. In comparison to the stock, derivatives, and currencies markets, it is a small number. Nevertheless, the growth potential is vast. It can be linked to the growth of their applicability in real life, the improvement of the technology itself, the increase of their legal status, and to the allowance of them as a payment tool on international and national markets. Any positive information and any novelty positively affect the growth of popularity and acceptance of cryptocurrencies. Studying the cryptocurrencies market helps to understand that even with the immense potential, the level of uncertainty around the new payment and investment tool is still high. It can be seen already now that people tend to a freer money circulation and a more democratic monetary policy. Cryptocurrencies allow to cut costs, which every economic agent faces every day. The process of the development of the cryptocurrencies market that was started 7 - 8 years ago actively transforms existing socioeconomic foundations of society by considerably simplifying interactions between economic agents in P2P, C2B and B2B sectors. The growth of the industry's capitalization confirms that people vote with their money for its development. The exchange value of the LEN token will be determined in accordance with the demand and supply for it. The more users of the LIQNET platform, the more participants need the LEN tokens. The company does not give any forecasts and does not participate in the formation of the value of the tokens. For more information, see the White Paper https://liqnet.io/static/docs/Liqnet_WhitePaper_en.pdf

Body: Good day, The market of cryptocurrency exchange is tightly bound to the cryptocurrencies themselves. It is at the early stage of its development. In comparison to the stock, derivatives, and currencies markets, it is a small number. Nevertheless, the growth potential is vast. It can be linked to the growth of their applicability in real life, the improvement of the technology itself, the increase of their legal status, and to the allowance of them as a payment tool on international and national markets. Any positive information and any novelty positively affect the growth of popularity and acceptance of cryptocurrencies. Studying the cryptocurrencies market helps to understand that even with the immense potential, the level of uncertainty around the new payment and investment tool is still high. It can be seen already now that people tend to a freer money circulation and a more democratic monetary policy. Cryptocurrencies allow to cut costs, which every economic agent faces every day. The process of the development of the cryptocurrencies market that was started 7 - 8 years ago actively transforms existing socioeconomic foundations of society by considerably simplifying interactions between economic agents in P2P, C2B and B2B sectors. The growth of the industry's capitalization confirms that people vote with their money for its development. Body: Q2 - Q3 2018 — purchase of the MT5/Multicharts license and its customization for our service Q3 2018 — connection of additional payment systems that allow making deposits from MC, Visa, Union Pay cards; possibly connection of PayPal and other systems Q3 - Q4 2018 — issue of one of the payment system's (Visa, MC, UP) cobranded cards; it will depend on the position of regulators and banks at that moment Q4 2018 — improvement and debugging of trading apps for Android and iOS (the prototypes of the solutions already exist) Q4 2018 - Q1 2019 — launch of the Internet acquiring service, actualization in the part of interaction with various cryptocurrencies on the current date Q2 2019 — release of the merchant acquiring service Q2 2019 — start of the margin trading/shi   pment futures trading End of 2018 - Beginning of 2019 — launch of the platform used to trade third-party tokens during ICOs (in a separate jurisdiction)  Quote from: UnIvErS on July 22, 2018, 10:56:28 AM Hello tried to understand itself but nothing happened please explain what is the technology of LEN?  Hello! Let me explain: the basis of the LIQNET project is a secure cryptocurrency exchange. It collects liquidity using both classic methods and a standalone mechanism that uses the in-house LEN technology. LEN is a mechanism that through an API allows to collect and combine data on requests to sell/buy from many cryptocurrency exchanges located anywhere in the world and to form a unified order book. LEN aggregates requests into a single stream, and because of that users can make deals at the most favorable price with a minimal spread  Quote from: CeNaToP on July 22, 2018, 11:48:05 AM And when you will be able to replenish the balance with a Visa card or allow PayPal?  Connection of additional payment systems that allow making deposits from MC, Visa, Union Pay cards is scheduled on Q3 2018. Possibly connection of PayPal and other systems. Author: LIQNET_official
Title: [ANN][ICO] LIQNET is a cryptoexchange solves the problem of market fragmentation
Body: Liquidity for the LIQNET exchange is collected both by classical methods and by a separate mechanism based on the LEN technology of our own design. The LEN mechanism (Liquidity Exchange Network) collects and consolidates LIQNET exchange clients orders and orders from third-party platforms into a single order book and makes them available for trading to all LIQNET clients.

Author: ICOEthics
Title: [ANN][ICO] LIQNET is a cryptoexchange solves the problem of market fragmentation
Body: Hello Liqnet team.   Thank you for your quick reply and for making this clear for possible investors and the community.  We investigate complains and look for evidence. The evidence provided is not fabricated, it is on the internet and you can look at yourself.  Here are the links again so you can see is it not a fabrication, and clearly say "stock photo".  Stock photo: https://www.kommersant.ru/photo/category_in/81602?id2= (which say:  "Stock photo: KPE_001669_00002_1 File format: jpg File size (Mbytes): 4,6 Photo size (pixels): 3840x5760 Buy   12  Deputy Director of the IC "Granite Capital" Vyacheslav Kasatkin"  Image of your CEO: https://www.coinschedule.com/p/9371/roman-shirokov  As you should know the market is flooded with scams, which are becoming hard for legitimate ICO's to distinguish themselves from scammers.  We have seen a big increase of ICOs manipulating photos and/or using stock images of their team, many have been caught recently. That stock photo of your team member will raise more questions from other people, and you should do something about that.  We have forwarded your response to those who had raised questions about your ICO Team members.   We appreciate your collaboration.   Thank you!!

Title: [ANN][ICO] LIQNET is a cryptoexchange solves the problem of market fragmentation
Body: Thanks a lot for your support, wishes and believing in LIQNET's success! We really appreciate it! Quote from: ErichKrause on July 20, 2018, 03:58:41 PM Quote from: FilliP_MoriS on July 20, 2018, 03:10:15 PM Quote from: BERgAMOT_BEHgEMOT on July 20, 2018, 02:27:05 PM The implementation of the blockade is now close, as never before. Now the situation will change radically would be happy about this but I'm not completely sure. Why are you not sure, I'm sure this is 100% Watching the steady growth one can draw a positive conclusion. Quote from: rahu0831 on July 20, 2018, 04:02:49 PM but we need multiple exchanges for good competition since it is healthy for customers Today, the number of exchanges has grown so much that the market needs unification to be able to continue to develop as a single organism. Users and their assets are split; therefore, liquidity is split, too. Cryptocurrencies should unite people, companies, and financial streams, but the fragmentation of trading over several platforms leads to increased volatility of many cryptographic currencies and assets. This scares traditional investors away from investing in cryptocurrencies. Low level of liquidity and considerable spreads don't help the development of the cryptocurrency industry. Naturally, exchanges should seek to get into a unified trading place to be able to use the combined liquidity to increase revenue. The abundance of exchange and trade tools on the market should also be critically reviewed. At first glance, the market is filled with stock and cryptocurrency exchanges. However, when filtered by such parameters as reliability, accessibility for end users (many exchanges are selective in allowing residents of different countries and jurisdictions to trade), ability to trade with required tools (fiduciary currencies included), the choice is narrowed drastically, and the illusion of abundance goes away. At the remaining optimal exchanges, liquidity will be limited. Therefore, during a market move or when buying or selling a significant amount of funds, a trader risks to fail to get the required amount or get it at an unacceptable price. We solved this problem by uniting liquidity streams from different platforms into one order book.

Author: LIQNET_official
Title: [ANN][ICO] LIQNET is a cryptoexchange solves the problem of market fragmentation
Body: Hi, Trading has either zero-fee or small fee depending on the trader's trading activity in the last 30 days. Trading fees have a distinction of a "maker" fee or a "taker" fee. Maker fees are paid when you add liquidity to our order book by placing a limit order under the ticker price for buy and above the ticker price for sell. Taker fees are paid when you remove liquidity from our order book, by placing any order that is executed against an order of the order book. A note about hidden orders: If you place a hidden order, you will always pay the taker fee. If you place a limit order that hits a hidden order, you will always pay the maker fee. Deposits are free except for international wires. Each withdrawals change small transaction or international wire fee (you can set up "Express" option which automatically collects additional fee). The complete and current fee information you can view at liqnet.com/fees/

Would like to join your dialogue a bit and to place emphasis on discounts on the exchange's fees to token holders, LEN token holders will get a discount on the exchange's fees of up to 90% depending on the number of tokens spent on it. How to get a discount: one token gives a 0,5% discount on the sum of fees for one day. The discount is activated for 24 hours in the personal account right after the withdrawal of tokens or at the set time. Increment size is 0,5%, the highest possible discount is 90%. The timing of the discount can be chosen in the personal account. For example, 10% discount on the fees for a day costs 20 tokens, 50% discount for a week requires 700 tokens. So, the platform allows to use the purchased LEN tokens and offers the holders the ability to get discounts and the right to vote on the way the funds received by the system are allocated.

Author: LIQNET_official
Title: [ANN][ICO] LIQNET is a cryptoexchange solves the problem of market fragmentation
Body: Greetings The thing is that LEN is a mechanism that through an API allows to collect and combine data on requests to sell/buy from many cryptocurrency exchanges located anywhere in the world and to form a unified order book. LEN aggregates requests into a single stream, and because of that users can make deals at the most favorable price with a minimal spread. LEN allows the LIQNET system to get an improved model from the standard model of market depth. The new model offers added liquidity at the intersection of supply and demand. As a result, LIQNET users work with a unified order book, which contains both orders of clients of this exchange and orders relayed from other platforms. Trading has either zero-fee or small fee depending on the trader's trading activity in the last 30 days. Trading fees have a distinction of a "maker" fee or a "taker" fee. Maker fees are paid when you add liquidity to our order book by placing a limit order under the ticker price for buy and above the ticker price for sell. Taker fees are paid when you remove liquidity from our order book, by placing any order that is executed against an order of the order book. A note about hidden orders: If you place a hidden order, you will always pay the taker fee. If you place a limit order that hits a hidden order, you will always pay the maker fee. Deposits are free except for international wires. Each withdrawals change small transaction or international wire fee (you can set up "Express" option which automatically collects additional fee).  See the complete and current fee information at liqnet.com/fees/

Author: LIQNET_official
Title: [ANN][ICO] LIQNET is a cryptoexchange solves the problem of market fragmentation
Body: Thanks for believing in our project! It means a lot to us! Quote from: Garag on July 17, 2018, 07:20:57 PM But all the same, what about the market situation. Does it cause you reasonable fear? Today, the number of exchanges has grown so much that the market needs unification to be able to continue to develop as a single organism. Users and their assets are split; therefore, liquidity is split, too. Cryptocurrencies should unite people, companies, and financial streams, but the fragmentation of trading over several platforms leads to increased volatility of many cryptographic currencies and assets. This scares traditional investors away from investing in cryptocurrencies. Low level of liquidity and considerable spreads don't help the development of the cryptocurrency industry. Naturally, exchanges should seek to get into a unified trading place to be able to use the combined liquidity to increase revenue. The abundance of exchange and trade tools on the market should also be critically reviewed. At first glance, the market is filled with stock and cryptocurrency exchanges. However, when filtered by such parameters as reliability, accessibility for end users (many exchanges are selective in allowing residents of different countries and jurisdictions to trade), ability to trade with required tools (fiduciary currencies included), the choice is narrowed drastically, and the illusion of abundance goes away. At the remaining optimal exchanges, liquidity will be limited. Therefore, during a market move or when buying or selling a significant amount of funds, a trader risks to fail to get the required amount or get it at an unacceptable price. We solved this problem by uniting liquidity streams from different platforms into one order book. Quote from: BlacK CrowN on July 17, 2018, 08:01:37 PM Explain me please I do not fully understand your idea. Sure! LIQNET is a cryptoexchange that aggregates liquidity from various platforms thus solving the problem of the splitting of users and their trading orders by forming a unified order book with the best market depth and prices. LEN (Liquidity Exchange Network) is what makes our exchange unique. This mechanism allows collecting and aggregating buy/sell orders through APIs of 1,2...n exchanges located anywhere in the world and forming a unified order book. Thus, orders are combined and users can now make deals with best prices and minimal spread. As a result, our users get access to the single order book, in which they see both the orders of our exchange and orders relayed from other platforms. Due to the platform aggregating sufficient amount of liquidity of various tools, it is planned to implement trading of deliverable futures and options for those that have the highest liquidity. LEN allows the LIQNET system to get an improved model from the standard model of market depth that offers added liquidity at the intersection of supply and demand. More information about LIQNET is available in our WP https://liqnet.io/static/docs/Liqnet_WhitePaper_en.pdf

It`s nothing to be afraid of! The Team is much experienced! The company LIQNET is registered in Singapore. In recent years, Singapore has done a great job of creating legislation that meets the most modern requirements of the cryptocurrency market. Strict laws of Singapore are primarily aimed at protecting traders, so LIQNET wants to meet the advanced requirements of local regulators, working ahead of time for most other jurisdictions. We are proud of this. The office in Singapore allows LIQNET to respond quickly to changes in both the legislative and business landscapes, because there is a very high concentration of blockchain projects and specialists there. This is the best place to conduct a global business in cryptocurrency trading. In the current active phase of preparation for entering the market, we decided to concentrate the entire team, including founders, developers, marketers and managers, in Russia. This allows us to minimize delays between decisions and their implementation. In the future, remote offices of LIQNET will be united by round-the-clock communication using advanced technologies of corporate interaction. Author: LIQNET_official
Title: [ANN][ICO] LIQNET is a cryptoexchange solves the problem of market fragmentation
Body: The greatest parts of the LIQNET exchange is the LEN (Liquidity Exchange Network) tool, which allows to collect and combine orders of our exchange's clients and orders from third-party platforms into a single order package and make them available for trading by all LIQNET's clients. The holders of the LEN tokens get privileged terms. Other advantages of LIQNET: 1.   Desktop apps (own desktop app, MultiCharts, TradingView, and MT5). 2.   Fully functional mobile trading apps for Android and iOS. 3.   An online-wallet project that provides the ability to exchange cryptocurrencies and fiat money by the press of a button. Additionally, it has the easy cryptocurrency investment service with free and paid built-in strategies. 4.   Acquiring service for receiving payments in cryptocurrencies that provides sellers with many capabilities and protects from many risks.

Title: [ANN][ICO] LIQNET is a cryptoexchange solves the problem of market fragmentation
Body: Oh, sure, our present and future plans due to the Road Map: JULY — 2018 Testing the core under high load, the number of sources of liquidity is greater than 10, the number of orders is more than 500 per second. Q2-Q3 — 2018 Purchase of the MT5 license and its customization for our service. Q3 — 2018 Connection of additional payment systems allowing you to replenish the balance from MC, Visa, Union Pay plastic cards, possibly, connection of PayPal and other payment systems. Q3-Q4 — 2018 Launch of an online wallet with the investor’s personal account and the functions of receiving, storing, sending funds, automatic convertion. Q4 — 2018 Improvement and bugfixing of the iOS and Android apps. Q1 — 2019 Launch of the Internet acquiring service, actualization in the part of interaction with various cryptocurrencies on the current date. Q2 — 2019 Launch of the merchant acquiring service. Q2 — 2019 Start of the margin trading/shipment futures trading. Q2 — 2019 Launch of the platform used to trade third-party tokens during ICOs (in a separate jurisdiction). You can also check it by yourself on our site https://liqnet.io/ or in the WP https://liqnet.io/static/docs/Liqnet_WhitePaper_en.pdf Sections RoadMap

But I need clarification, is it going to work through API? Is it something like TabTrader only or TabTrader plus own exchange? I hope to get a response soon.  Hi, So, the basis of the LIQNET project is a secure cryptocurrency exchange. It collects liquidity using both classic methods and a standalone mechanism that uses the in-house LEN technology. LEN is a mechanism that through an API allows to collect and combine data on requests to sell/buy from many cryptocurrency exchanges located anywhere in the world and to form a unified order book. Title: [ANN][ICO] LIQNET is a cryptoexchange solves the problem of market fragmentation
Body: Quote from: PISTON_1 on July 13, 2018, 06:22:04 PM Quote from: Vurdalakus on July 13, 2018, 06:01:14 PM Quote from: Monopoli$T on July 13, 2018, 05:49:29 PM Tell me also can this project be compared to other projects doing the same? I cant say they are better or not. Liqnet is an unique project with partly working product. Not just an idea. They are doing real project not the words. Yes it is good but what comparative advantages does it have?  Quote from: UnIvErS on July 13, 2018, 06:51:04 PM It is very interesting to know about it too ?  LIQNET is a cryptoexchange, which allows to unite liquidity from different platforms and solve the problem of scattering of users, their trading requests, and orders, thus forming a unified order book with better market depth and better prices for private persons and legal entities from various jurisdictions.  What makes the LIQNET exchange unique is the LEN (Liquidity Exchange Network) tool, which allows to collect and combine orders of our exchange's clients and orders from third-party platforms into a single order package and make them available for trading by all LIQNET's clients. The holders of the LEN tokens get privileged terms. Other advantages of LIQNET: 1.   Desktop apps (own desktop app, MultiCharts, TradingView, and MT5). 2.   Fully functional mobile trading apps for Android and iOS. 3.   An online-wallet project that provides the ability to exchange cryptocurrencies and fiat money by the press of a button. Additionally, it has the easy cryptocurrency investment service with free and paid built-in strategies. 4.   Acquiring service for receiving payments in cryptocurrencies that provides sellers with many capabilities and protects from many risks.  Quote from: Monopoli$T on July 13, 2018, 05:49:29 PM Tell me also can this project be compared to other projects doing the same? I cant say they are better or not.  By the second quarter, LIQNET did not have a single efficient competitor on the global market. Exchanges-aggregators are being developed and sooner or later will open for traders, but by this time LIQNET will gain valuable experience and a large client base. Quote from: GOZIC on July 11, 2018, 11:00:26 PM One token gives you a 0,5% discount on all the fees per day. The discount is activated for 24 hours right after the  the withdrawal of tokens or at the set date. Greetings   Thank you for your questions and additions! So, as for the benefits for the Token Holders and the possibilities that the Token offers, we have the following : On the developing cryptocurrencies market, the LIQNET's ICO may be one of the few options for investors to enter the cryptocurrency services and exchanges market through a finished elaborated project. Our ICO stands out from the majority of the others because it is not just an idea. It is a real product ready for launch. It will be able to increase its competitive advantages and allow us to develop exponentially with the help of tokenization. LEN token holders will get a discount on the exchange's fees of up to 90% depending on the number of tokens spent on it. Purchase a discount on fees: one token gives a 0,5% discount on the sum of fees for one day. The discount if activated for 24 hours in the personal account immediately after the withdrawal of tokens or at a particular time. Increment size is 0,5%, the highest possible discount is 90%. The timing of the discount can be chosen in the personal account. The platform allows to use the purchased LEN tokens and offers the holders the ability to get discounts and the right to vote on the way the funds received by the system are allocated. LEN token holders get access to the voting service to decide on the following crucial matters: ●Choice of trading pairs that should be present on the exchange — initially, the system has only one or two pairs, and the token holders choose the first 20 pairs, which will be added to the system immediately after the ICO; ●Choice of the ways of spending 50% of collected fees: ○ selection of additional trading pairs to be added to the exchange during the later work, except for the pairs that will be added by the LIQNET developers; ○ an increase of the exchange's marketing budget; ○ expansion of deposits in other exchanges to provide better liquidity on the LIQNET platform; ○ choice of additional sources of liquidity for LIQNET, except for those added by the LIQNET developers; ○ a buy-out of tokens on our platform at current prices to support the demand for them. Doing this will help to avoid the sales of the tokens at low prices, and, therefore, prevent the users from having access to super cheap discounts in large amounts — this may lead to the substantial decrease in the volume of the exchange's fees.

Author: LIQNET_official
Title: [ANN][ICO] LIQNET is a cryptoexchange solves the problem of market fragmentation
Body: Hello) The basis of the LIQNET project is a secure cryptocurrency exchange. It collects liquidity using both classic methods and a standalone mechanism that uses the in-house LEN technology. LEN is a mechanism that through an API allows to collect and combine data on requests to sell/buy from many cryptocurrency exchanges located anywhere in the world and to form a unified order book. LEN aggregates requests into a single stream, and because of that users can make deals at the most favorable price with a minimal spread. LEN allows the LIQNET system to get an improved model from the standard model of market depth. The new model offers added liquidity at the intersection of supply and demand. As a result, LIQNET users work with a unified order book, which contains both orders of clients of this exchange and orders relayed from other platforms. For more detail info you can turn to our WP(starting p. 3)  https://liqnet.io/static/docs/Liqnet_WhitePaper_en.pdf

Author: LIQNET_official
Title: [ANN][ICO] LIQNET is a cryptoexchange solves the problem of market fragmentation
Body: LEN token holders will get a discount on the exchange's fees of up to 90% depending on the number of tokens spent on it. One token gives a 0,5% discount on the sum of fees for one day. The discount is activated for 24 hours in the personal account right after the withdrawal of tokens or at the set time. Increment size is 0,5%, the highest possible discount is 90%. The timing of the discount can be chosen in the personal account. For example, 10% discount on the fees for a day costs 20 tokens, 50% discount for a week requires 700 tokens. LEN token holders get access to the voting service to decide on the following crucial matters: ●   Choice of trading pairs that should be present on the exchange — initially, the system has only one or two pairs, and the token holders choose the first 20 pairs, which will be added to the system immediately after the ICO; ●   Choice of the ways of spending 50% of collected fees.  The detailed information you can find in the WP, starting p. 12.  Quote from: fancy2973 on July 10, 2018, 01:37:20 PM Quote from: PISTON_1 on July 09, 2018, 12:45:20 PM Quote from: Vurdalakus on July 09, 2018, 12:11:01 PM What can you tell about the fragmentation of liquidity? By the end of the decade, global cryptocurrency trading is scattered among various platforms, which led to severe fragmentation of liquidity. The lower the liquidity, the lower the average volume of a trading position in comparison to stock   It isn't a bad thing per se to have hundreds of exchanges as they also compete with each other for offering the best prices and security.  Today, the number of exchanges has grown so much that the market needs unification to be able to continue to develop as a single organism. Users and their assets are split; therefore, liquidity is split, too. Cryptocurrencies should unite people, companies, and financial streams, but the fragmentation of trading over several platforms leads to increased volatility of many cryptographic currencies and assets. This scares traditional investors away from investing in cryptocurrencies. Low level of liquidity and considerable spreads don't help the development of the cryptocurrency industry. Naturally, exchanges should seek to get into a unified trading place to be able to use the combined liquidity to increase revenue. The abundance of exchange and trade tools on the market should also be critically reviewed. At first glance, the market is filled with stock and cryptocurrency exchanges. However, when filtered by such parameters as reliability, accessibility for end users (many exchanges are selective in allowing residents of different countries and jurisdictions to trade), ability to trade with required tools (fiduciary currencies included), the choice is narrowed drastically, and the illusion of abundance goes away. At the remaining optimal exchanges, liquidity will be limited. Therefore, during a market move or when buying or selling a significant amount of funds, a trader risks to fail to get the required amount or get it at an unacceptable price. We solved this problem by uniting liquidity streams from different platforms into one order book.   Quote from: caecoli on July 10, 2018, 01:41:36 PM The project looks quite promising. A rather interesting vision, wondrous plan, rational results!  We grateful for your support  It is much important for us! I'm sure it has a well cut out plan on how to solve the fragmentation issues associated with cryptocurrency exchanges. Hopefully, the project will be a success. Title: [ANN][ICO] LIQNET is a cryptoexchange solves the problem of market fragmentation
Body: Hello) By the end of the decade, global cryptocurrency trading found itself scattered among various platforms, which led to severe fragmentation of liquidity. The lower the liquidity, the lower the average volume of a trading position in comparison to stock and other classical markets. Moreover, in the moments of abrupt market movements, it can be insufficient even for trading low volumes of cryptocurrencies. LIQNET is a cryptoexchange, which allows to unite liquidity from different platforms and solve the problem of scattering of users, their trading requests, and orders, thus forming a unified order book with better market depth and better prices for private persons and legal entities from various jurisdictions. Author: LIQNET_official
Title: [ANN][ICO] LIQNET is a cryptoexchange solves the problem of market fragmentation
Body: Hello) Today, the number of exchanges has grown so much that the market needs unification to be able to continue to develop as a single organism. Users and their assets are split; therefore, liquidity is split, too. Cryptocurrencies should unite people, companies, and financial streams, but the fragmentation of trading over several platforms leads to increased volatility of many cryptographic currencies and assets. This scares traditional investors away from investing in cryptocurrencies. Low level of liquidity and considerable spreads don't help the development of the cryptocurrency industry. Naturally, exchanges should seek to get into a unified trading place to be able to use the combined liquidity to increase revenue. The abundance of exchange and trade tools on the market should also be critically reviewed. At first glance, the market is filled with stock and cryptocurrency exchanges. However, when filtered by such parameters as reliability, accessibility for end users (many exchanges are selective in allowing residents of different countries and jurisdictions to trade), ability to trade with required tools (fiduciary currencies included), the choice is narrowed drastically, and the illusion of abundance goes away. At the remaining optimal exchanges, liquidity will be limited. Therefore, during a market move or when buying or selling a significant amount of funds, a trader risks to fail to get the required amount or get it at an unacceptable price. We solved this problem by uniting liquidity streams from different platforms into one order book. Quote from: GOZIC on July 08, 2018, 05:20:18 PM   I think that is not quete clear. But I have heard about the interview. Hi) I`ve given the brief answer above, but more detailed information you can also find in our WP https://liqnet.io/static/docs/Liqnet_WhitePaper_en.pdf Quote from: hugasinora on July 08, 2018, 06:11:39 PM I see that The base of the LIQNET project is a protected cryptocurrency exchange, if you see ideas on this project need to be monitored its development, I hope the exchange will be easier for someone to do trading and transactions  Greetings) You are absolutely right! The security of the server side has been thoroughly tested. To ensure the security of user data and tools, we implemented the following protective measures: - two-step authentication; - system of replicated geo-distributed servers with the possibility of scaling; - geo-distributed array of hot, conditionally hot, cold wallets, as well as addresses with a multisignature for each cryptocurrency; - a background clearing system that checks the correctness of current balances and I/Os between full cross-sections, and when a discrepancy registers a dangerous state, it transfers funds to cold wallets and multisignature addresses. Thanks for your feedback! Quote from: YGICIQU on July 08, 2018, 06:37:27 PM He told everyone that Binance is a scam. And Qtum too. Hey! Here we are talking about LIQNET! Quote from: Imhotepp on July 08, 2018, 07:56:00 PM And why don’t you think that this project is not a scam. Can you proof it. Hello! LIQNET project is not a scam! We work hard to make our project successful! You can view our official website https://liqnet.io/ check the team behind the LIQNET on the site or in our WP, starting p. 23 https://liqnet.io/static/docs/Liqnet_WhitePaper_en.pdf and also LIQNET is already running in test mode, just try it http://liqnet.com Quote from: Razhabov on July 08, 2018, 08:04:06 PM You can find the info in the web. I don’t think you need my help to do it. Sure! Thanks for the help!

Author: LIQNET_official
Title: [ANN][ICO] LIQNET is a cryptoexchange solves the problem of market fragmentation
Body: Hello) Of course) Advantages of LIQNET Exchange: 1. Ability to execute a big order at the best price (large market depth). 2. Minimal spreads. 3. Ability to trade large volumes without the risk of shifting the market. 4. Best prices, minimal spreads, and the biggest volumes all in one place. 5.Desktop apps (own desktop app, MultiCharts, TradingView, and MT5). 6.Fully functional mobile trading apps for Android and iOS. 7.An online-wallet project that provides the ability to exchange cryptocurrencies and fiat money by the press of a button. Additionally, it has the easy cryptocurrency investment service with free and paid built-in strategies. 8.Acquiring service for receiving payments in cryptocurrencies that provides sellers with many capabilities and protects from many risks Benefits for the Token Holders: On the developing cryptocurrencies market, the LIQNET's ICO may be one of the few options for investors to enter the cryptocurrency services and exchanges market through a finished elaborated project. Our ICO stands out from the majority of the others because it is not just an idea. It is a real product ready for launch. It will be able to increase its competitive advantages and allow us to develop exponentially with the help of tokenization. Title: [ANN][ICO] LIQNET is a cryptoexchange solves the problem of market fragmentation
Body: Absolutely right! Thanks for your comment! Quote from: tinhtevn on July 09, 2018, 07:18:35 AM   I propose to LIQNET team to add different pairs with fiats to make its more comfortable for users. Thank you. We will take into account your proposal) As for now LEN has one pressing issue: not all exchanges offer a trading pair with USD, some trade cryptocurrencies directly for national currencies. The solution is to make interactions in LEN more complex: national currencies can be transmitted by connecting a currency gateway and quoting these pairs with their exchange rate to the dollar in mind and then into the main blotter. In this case, unfortunately, fees for currency conversion are added. Economic calculations prove that it is better to pay an additional fee and get cheaper liquidity so that this feature will be implemented by Q3 2018. Quote from: teejaymuna on July 09, 2018, 07:22:52 AM Being an exchange on its own makes Liqnet a stand out. I'm sure it has a well cut out plan on how to solve the fragmentation issues associated with cryptocurrency exchanges. Hopefully, the project will be a success. Thanks for believing in LIQNET project. By the way, LIQNET Solutions are fully described in our WP, starting p. 3 https://liqnet.io/static/docs/Liqnet_WhitePaper_en.pdf

Author: Razhabov
Title: [ANN][ICO] LIQNET is a cryptoexchange solves the problem of market fragmentation
Body: OClosed jurisdiction is in the form of restrictions on the activities of companies and individuals from other jurisdictions, in particular in the financial sphere, and in particular in the field of turnover of cryptocurrencies and related services. Closed jurisdictions may also include regions, access to which is limited to the specifics of the market and the positions of those already operating in such a domain. And why are so sure that is really so?

Author: LIQNET_official
Title: [ANN][ICO] LIQNET is a cryptoexchange solves the problem of market fragmentation
Body: Closed jurisdiction is any territory whose current legislation, in one way or another, creates restrictions on the activities of companies and individuals from other jurisdictions, in particular in the financial sphere, and in particular in the field of turnover of cryptocurrencies and related services. Closed jurisdictions may also include regions, access to which is limited due to the specifics of the market and the positions of those already operating in such a domain. Author: LIQNET_official
Title: [ANN][ICO] LIQNET is a cryptoexchange solves the problem of market fragmentation
Body: Here we discuss the LIQNET project only. As for LIQNET`s security, the server side of the LIQNET platform is a private cloud, which is composed of physical servers in several locations and client terminals (currently, one terminal for web browsers). The security of the server side has been thoroughly tested. To ensure the security of user data and tools, we implemented the following protective measures: - two-step authentication; - system of replicated geo-distributed servers with the possibility of scaling; - geo-distributed array of hot, conditionally hot, cold wallets, as well as addresses with a multisignature for each cryptocurrency; - a background clearing system that checks the correctness of current balances and I/Os between full cross-sections, and when a discrepancy registers a dangerous state, it transfers funds to cold wallets and multisignature addresses.

Author: LIQNET_official
Title: [ANN][ICO] LIQNET is a cryptoexchange solves the problem of market fragmentation
Body: Hello! LIQNET is a cryptoexchange, which allows to unite liquidity from different platforms and solve the problem of scattering of users, their trading requests, and orders, thus forming a unified order book with better market depth and better prices for private persons and legal entities from various jurisdictions.  What makes the LIQNET exchange unique is the LEN (Liquidity Exchange Network) tool, which allows to collect and combine orders of our exchange's clients and orders from third-party platforms into a single order package and make them available for trading by all LIQNET's clients.  I recommend you to start from reading our WP and website  https://liqnet.io/ https://liqnet.io/static/docs/Liqnet_WhitePaper_en.pdf  After that I will gladly answer all your questions   Quote from: fukura on July 04, 2018, 04:33:33 PM Looks great plan! Extraordinary approach, responsive project!  Good luck DEVs!  Nice you are with LIQNET! Thanks for your sweet words

Author: Razhabov
Title: [ANN][ICO] LIQNET is a cryptoexchange solves the problem of market fragmentation
Body: Hello how well is your system protected from hackers?

Author: LIQNET_official
Title: [ANN][ICO] LIQNET is a cryptoexchange solves the problem of market fragmentation
Body: Hello!  To ensure the security of user data and tools, we implemented the following protective measures:  - two-step authentication; - system of replicated geo-distributed servers with the possibility of scaling; - geo-distributed array of hot, conditionally hot, cold wallets, as well as addresses with a multisignature for each cryptocurrency; - a background clearing system that checks the correctness of current balances and I/Os between full cross-sections, and when a discrepancy registers a dangerous state, it transfers funds to cold wallets and multisignature addresses.

Author: Fett11
Title: [ANN][ICO] LIQNET is a cryptoexchange solves the problem of market fragmentation
Body: LEN is a mechanism that makes it possible to collect and merge buy/sell orders into a single order book via API's provided by exchanges.

Author: LIQNET_official
Title: [ANN][ICO] LIQNET is a cryptoexchange solves the problem of market fragmentation
Body: Hello) It`s Great that you are with LIQNET! We are thankful for your feedback! Quote from: DyxLEzz on June 21, 2018, 10:51:57 AM What is the LEN technology? Hi) Let me explain: LEN is a mechanism that allows you to collect and aggregate data on buy/sell requests through an API from a variety of cryptoexchanges located anywhere in the world and form a single order book. LEN aggregates orders into a single stream, so users can make deals at the best prices with a minimum spread. LEN allows the LIQNET system to obtain from the standard depth model an improved model with additional liquidity at the meeting point of supply and demand. As a result, LIQNET users work with a single order book, in which both the orders of the clients of this exchange are presented, as well as retranslated orders from other sites. Quote from: Fett11 on June 21, 2018, 11:00:01 AM Quote from: DyxLEzz on June 21, 2018, 10:51:57 AM What is the LEN technology? LEN is a mechanism that makes it possible to collect and merge buy/sell orders into a single order book via API's provided by exchanges. Greetings! Yes, correctly! Thank you)

Yes it`s so and as a result, LIQNET users work with a unified order book, which contains both orders of clients of this exchange and orders relayed from other platforms. Thanks for your addition)

Author: TouGhiE
Title: [ANN][ICO] LIQNET is a cryptoexchange solves the problem of market fragmentation
Body: I'm wondering what is the basis of the Liqnet project

Author: LIQNET_official
Title: [ANN][ICO] LIQNET is a cryptoexchange solves the problem of market fragmentation
Body: Hello! The server side of the LIQNET platform is a private cloud, which is composed of physical servers in several locations and client terminals (currently, one terminal for web browsers). The security of the server side has been thoroughly tested. To ensure the security of user data and tools, we implemented the following protective measures: - two-step authentication; - system of replicated geo-distributed servers with the possibility of scaling; - geo-distributed array of hot, conditionally hot, cold wallets, as well as addresses with a multisignature for each cryptocurrency; - a background clearing system that checks the correctness of current balances and I/Os between full cross-sections, and when a discrepancy registers a dangerous state, it transfers funds to cold wallets and multisignature addresses. More detailed information, you can read in our WP, starting p.3 https://liqnet.io/static/docs/Liqnet_WhitePaper_en.pdf Quote from: Vurdalakus on June 21, 2018, 11:55:12 AM Interesting. Is LIQNET exchange already working in the test mode? Yes, LIQNET is already running in test mode. Try it http://liqnet.com Quote from: PISTON_1 on June 21, 2018, 12:09:34 PM Quote from: Vurdalakus on June 21, 2018, 11:55:12 AM Interesting. Is LIQNET exchange already working in the test mode? Yes! The project is one of the few options for investing in the cryptocurrency exchange and services market through a ready product. Thanks for the response   Quote from: Jozwiak John on June 21, 2018, 12:20:00 PM Looking forward for more updates! Amazing activity, a rather interesting business.  Good luck guys. Greetings) Currently the Team is working hard on development and improvement the project. As soon as the news is available, we will immediately notify you, be sure! Just stay with us) Appreciate your support and wishes! Quote from: TouGhiE on June 21, 2018, 12:30:19 PM I'm wondering what is the basis of the Liqnet project Halloo!) The basis of the LIQNET project is a secure cryptocurrency exchange. It collects liquidity using both classic methods and a standalone mechanism that uses the in-house LEN technology.

Hey LIQNET is a cryptoexchange, which allows to unite liquidity from different platforms and solve the problem of scattering of users, their trading requests, and orders, thus forming a unified order book with better market depth and better prices for private persons and legal entities from various jurisdictions. What makes the LIQNET exchange unique is the LEN (Liquidity Exchange Network) tool, which allows to collect and combine orders of our exchange's clients and orders from third-party platforms into a single order package and make them available for trading by all LIQNET's clients. The holders of the LEN tokens get privileged terms. Other advantages of LIQNET: 1. Desktop apps (own desktop app, MultiCharts, TradingView, and MT5). 2. Fully functional mobile trading apps for Android and iOS. 3. An online-wallet project that provides the ability to exchange cryptocurrencies and fiat money by the press of a button. Additionally, it has the easy cryptocurrency investment service with free and paid built-in strategies. 4. Acquiring service for receiving payments in cryptocurrencies that provides sellers with many capabilities and protects from many risks.

Body: Hi and thanks for support and wishes) Quote from: MoNeY TrEE on June 18, 2018, 08:01:07 AM Hello. Could you tell me how you are going to distribute tokens? Hello   LIQNET's specialists are interested in creating the most profitable product, effectively using all the resources. Of particular importance is the development of a financial strategy and openness to investors. This schedule reflects the distribution of funds from ICO investors and is fair for fees of one hundred and more percent of Soft cap: 1. Circulating capital, because to supply the execution of orders, assets must be placed on platforms that generate liquidity.   65% 2. Registration of subsidiaries to have access to cryptocurrency platforms in closed jurisdictions.   5% 3. Connection of currency gateways.   0,5% 4. Connection of additional payment systems that allow to accept payments made with MasterCard, Visa, and Union Pay. It is also possible to add PayPal and other similar systems.   3% 5. Equipment — purchase of spaces in data centers, equipment, and required software and subscription to its technical support, visits of the company's specialists to data centers to set up the systems safely.   2% 6. Connection and customization of professional trading apps — own desktop app, MultiCharts, MT4, MT5, and others.   2% 7. iOS and Android apps with a full personal account and with extensive trading capabilities.   1% 8. Online wallet with the ability to exchange cryptocurrencies and fiat money with a push of a button and with the integration of the simplified service of cryptocurrency investing using paid and free built-in strategies, development of mobile apps.   5% 9. Acquiring service — development, connection of maps, improvement of the payments receiving app, payment terminal, etc., development of iOS and Android acquiring apps (the app is installed on a smartphone, it can scan QR codes and allows to accept payments for goods and services in cryptocurrencies).   5% 10. Team expansion.   4% 11. Participation of the team in international conferences on specific subjects (fintech, the blockchain, Bitcoin, information security, engineering development).   0,5% 12. Improvement of speed, quality control, and information security of development processes of existing and additional components of the service by purchasing products of third-party companies, hiring design studios and testing teams.   2% 13. Marketing and advertising — to reach target audiences, widen the presence and increase popularity in various regions, study regional specifics, get formal independent assessments of trust for and stability of the company.   5% Total:   100%

Author: LIQNET_official
Title: [ANN][ICO] LIQNET is a cryptoexchange solves the problem of market fragmentation
Body: Greetings) In recent years, Singapore has done a great job of creating legislation that meets the most modern requirements of the cryptocurrency market. Strict laws of Singapore are primarily aimed at protecting traders, so LIQNET wants to meet the advanced requirements of local regulators, working ahead of time for most other jurisdictions. We are proud of this. The office in Singapore allows LIQNET to respond quickly to changes in both the legislative and business landscapes, because there is a very high concentration of blockchain projects and specialists there. This is the best place to conduct a global business in cryptocurrency trading.

Classic cryptocurrency exchanges with which LIQNET works as a client by using the LEN mechanism. It connects to them through an API and executes a significant number of trading operations thus increasing the competitor's turnover and pays fees for every operation, therefore, making profits for the competitor.  2. Forex brokers who are offering to trade the BTC-USD and other cryptocurrencies pairs. They are not considered direct competitors because they work with non-deliverable CFD contracts on the price difference. Cryptocurrency can be bought from them, but it can't be withdrawn.  3. B2BX project. It is not an aggregator of real cryptocurrency liquidity. It would be more proper to consider it as an offer to brokers to implement trading of contracts on the difference between prices in BTC and ETH, an attempt to connect brokers and their clients, who trade to lower the brokers' risks of changing prices of cryptocurrencies. Because non-covered risks will have to be covered on the markets with an actual shipment of assets anyway, LIQNET will be the best solution for that. In other words, B2BX is not a competitor, but LIQNET's potential client.  4. Futures contracts from CME Group, CBOE.  A futures contract on Bitcoin index put on the market is not a competitor to LIQNET. If the possibility of an arbitrage appears, traders need a place to buy or sell the base asset. Because the index is calculated based on the data from four cryptoexchanges, each of which is a supplier of liquidity, LIQNET is the optimal platform for that, because it provides the maximum volume of liquidity for the best price. Therefore, the issue of futures leads to the increase of the number of traders, who want to trade physical assets at the LIQNET platform.

Author: LIQNET_official
Title: [ANN][ICO] LIQNET is a cryptoexchange solves the problem of market fragmentation
Body: Hello) LEN is a mechanism that allows you to collect and aggregate data on buy/sell requests through an API from a variety of cryptoexchanges located anywhere in the world and form a single order book. LEN aggregates orders into a single stream, so users can make deals at the best prices with a minimum spread. LEN allows the LIQNET system to obtain from the standard depth model an improved model with additional liquidity at the meeting point of supply and demand. As a result, LIQNET users work with a single order book, in which both the orders of the clients of this exchange are presented, as well as retranslated orders from other sites. More detailed information you can find in our WP https://liqnet.io/static/docs/Liqnet_WhitePaper_en.pdf Quote from: Monopoli$T on June 12, 2018, 09:11:55 AM   LEN is a mechanism that allows you to collect and combine data on buy/sell orders from a variety of crypto-currency exchanges located anywhere in the world through the API and form a single market glass. Greetings) The blockchain technology is based on the distributed computer network with cryptographic-based security and a particular protocol of network nodes interactions — accumulation of information in a block and its further verification by all nodes. The blockchain is the core of all cryptocurrencies, so the prospects of its development directly influence the future of the whole market. Conspicuously, the obstacles to the technology's development mostly pertain to the low level of understanding of the technology itself — for example, it is one of the reasons for the governmental rejection of the technology. This is common for every new technology that is aimed at changing existing foundations of society. At the dawn of its development, Internet has faced similar problems. On the other hand, the prospects that blockchain offers are capable of drastically improving the current situation in the world and first of all in the monetary field.

Author: LIQNET_official
Title: [ANN][ICO] LIQNET is a cryptoexchange solves the problem of market fragmentation
Body: Hi, The market of cryptocurrency exchange is tightly bound to the cryptocurrencies themselves. It is at the early stage of its development. In comparison to the stock, derivatives, and currencies markets, it is a small number. Nevertheless, the growth potential is vast. The process of the development of the cryptocurrencies market that was started 7 - 8 years ago actively transforms existing socioeconomic foundations of society by considerably simplifying interactions between economic agents in P2P, C2B and B2B sectors. The growth of the industry's capitalization confirms that people vote with their money for its development. Quote from: PISTON_1 on June 12, 2018, 09:53:53 AM I do not know what "mining"is,could you tell ? Hello. With pleasure) One of the critical components of the cryptocurrency market is mining. Miners are the ones who are doing the verification of blocks, in other words, confirm the correctness of transactions that are included in them. Mining is actively gaining momentum while taking new forms and reaching new scales (cloud mining, mining hotels, modernization of old facilities into large mining farms).

Author: LIQNET_official
Title: [ANN][ICO] LIQNET is a cryptoexchange solves the problem of market fragmentation
Body: Hi! Cryptocurrency storage and accounting system comprise the following subsystems: ●   platform's internal cryptocurrency storage system (a geographically spread out array of hot, conditionally hot, and cold wallets and multisig addresses for every cryptocurrency); ●   background clearing service (validates current balances and inputs and outputs between full cross-sections, and if there's an inconsistency, it registers the dangerous state and transfers the funds to cold wallets and multisig addresses); ●   external cryptocurrency storage system LEN Funds Manager (accounts for circulating capital distributed among exchanges, allows to transfer cryptocurrencies between exchanges and the platform); ●   circulating capital, earned fees, storage locations, and transfer limits accounting system.   Quote from: Fett11 on June 10, 2018, 09:24:07 AM guys, will investors get any bonuses ?  We decided to change the strategy for the LIQNET project. ICO is temporarily suspended. We got feedback from community and during the exhibitions we have attended. So, we must take into consideration all the flaws and continue to work on the project. ICO will start approximately in a month and a half. Because of that We reconsider the strategy for ICO terms and bonuses. If you join the White List, we will inform you about  any changes in the bonus policy and the exact date of sale's start.  Quote from: Noriman on June 10, 2018, 09:31:36 AM Why do you need to open subsidiaries?  We need to open subsidiaries to have access to cryptocurrency platforms in closed jurisdictions.

Body: On the developing cryptocurrencies market, the LIQNET's ICO may be one of the few ways for investors to enter the cryptocurrency services and exchanges market through a finished elaborated project. Our ICO stands out from the majority of the others because it is not just an idea. It is a real product ready for launch. It will be able to increase its competitive advantages and allow us to develop exponentially with the help of tokenization. Do not miss the opportunity   Quote from: AGRE$$IV on June 10, 2018, 09:43:47 AM it looks like a complete and well thought-out Platform!  Thank you! We do our best   Quote from: TiN SoldieR on June 10, 2018, 09:50:31 AM Quote from: PISTON_1 on June 10, 2018, 09:47:02 AM What opportunities do LEN token holders get? I know that holders of this token receive a discount on the exchange Commission up to 90%  Exactly. Thanks for support   Also LEN token holders get access to the voting service to decide on the following crucial matters: ●   Choice of trading pairs that should be present on the exchange — initially, the system has only one or two pairs, and the token holders choose the first 20 pairs, which will be added to the system immediately after the ICO; ●   Choice of the ways of spending 50% of collected fees: ○   selection of additional trading pairs to be added to the exchange during the later work, except for the pairs that will be added by the LIQNET developers; ○   an increase of the exchange's marketing budget; ○   expansion of deposits in other exchanges to provide better liquidity on the LIQNET platform; ○   choice of additional sources of liquidity for LIQNET, except for those added by the LIQNET developers; ○   a buy-out of tokens on our platform at current prices to support the demand for them. Doing this will help to avoid the sales of the tokens at low prices, and, therefore, prevent the users from having access to super cheap discounts in large amounts — this may lead to the substantial decrease in the volume of the exchange's fees.  Quote from: UnIvErS on June 10, 2018, 09:53:31 AM Hello, tell us more, how will protection against fraud be implemented?  Hello! To ensure the security of user data and tools, we implemented the following protective measures:  - two-step authentication; - system of replicated geo-distributed servers with the possibility of scaling; - geo-distributed array of hot, conditionally hot, cold wallets, as well as addresses with a multisignature for each cryptocurrency; - a background clearing system that checks the correctness of current balances and I/Os between full cross-sections, and when a discrepancy registers a dangerous state, it transfers funds to cold wallets and multisignature addresses.

Almost all cryptoexchanges provide such trading APIs. They see LEN as an automated trading system, which makes numerous trading operations thus increasing liquidity and pays a fee for each transaction making profits for them.  Quote from: GOZIC on June 09, 2018, 11:50:01 AM What is necessary to connect crypto-exchange to LEN?  To connect a cryptocurrency exchange to LEN, a user should register an account, deposit some money, and implement a particular LEN module that uses the exchange's open API. LIQNET also does this operation. The central questions that arise are about economics: transmitted size of market liquidity, choice of markets, and amounts of fees.

But don't worry, the solution is to make interactions in LEN more complex: national currencies can be transmitted by connecting a currency gateway and quoting these pairs with their exchange rate to the dollar in mind and then into the main blotter. Economic calculations prove that it is better to pay an additional fee and get cheaper liquidity so that this feature will be implemented by Q3 2018.

Title: [ANN][ICO] LIQNET is a cryptoexchange solves the problem of market fragmentation
Body: The LEN technology consists of three essential services: 1.Data collector 2.Automated trading system (provides hedging of clients' deals at "external" platforms) 3.Automated system that allocates and accounts for funds (provides positive balances at "external" platforms, accounts for profitability as an additional control tool of an automated trading system)  Quote from: GeRa_182 on June 08, 2018, 11:02:15 AM   it consists of 3 main services:information collector, automatic trading system and automatic system of distribution and accounting of funds Yes, it`s so. Thanks)  Quote from: NeRoX82 on June 08, 2018, 11:06:30 AM What does this platform aspire to? LIQNET aspires to unite liquidity from different platforms and solve the problem of scattering of users, their trading requests, and orders, thus forming a unified order book with better market depth and better prices for private persons and legal entities from various jurisdictions. Full detailed information you can find in our WP https://liqnet.io/static/docs/Liqnet_WhitePaper_en.pdf

Author: LIQNET_official
Title: [ANN][ICO] LIQNET is a cryptoexchange solves the problem of market fragmentation
Body: Hello) Let me explain it more detailed: LIQNET is a cryptoexchange, which allows to unite liquidity from different platforms and solve the problem of scattering of users, their trading requests, and orders, thus forming a unified order book with better market depth and better prices for private persons and legal entities from various jurisdictions. What makes the LIQNET exchange unique is the LEN (Liquidity Exchange Network) tool, which allows to collect and combine orders of our exchange's clients and orders from third-party platforms into a single order package and make them available for trading by all LIQNET's clients. The holders of the LEN tokens get privileged terms. Other advantages of LIQNET: 1.   Desktop apps (own desktop app, MultiCharts, TradingView, and MT5). 2.   Fully functional mobile trading apps for Android and iOS. 3.   An online-wallet project that provides the ability to exchange cryptocurrencies and fiat money by the press of a button. Additionally, it has the easy cryptocurrency investment service with free and paid built-in strategies. 4.   Acquiring service for receiving payments in cryptocurrencies that provides sellers with many capabilities and protects from many risks.

Author: LIQNET_official
Title: [ANN][ICO] LIQNET is a cryptoexchange solves the problem of market fragmentation
Body: Hello) Let me explain: What makes the LIQNET exchange unique is the LEN (Liquidity Exchange Network) tool that allows to collect and combine orders of our exchange’s clients and orders from third-party platforms into a single order package and make them available for trading by all LIQNET’s clients. LEN is mechanism that through an API allows to collect and combine data on requests to sell/buy from lots of cryptocurrencyexchanges located anywhere in the world and to form a unified order book. LEN aggregates requests from several cryptocurrency exchanges into a single stream so that users can make deals at the most favorable price with a minimal spread.

Author: ettaburger
Title: [ANN][ICO] LIQNET is a cryptoexchange solves the problem of market fragmentation
Body: To ensure the security, we implemented the following protective measures: - two-step authentication; - system of replicated geo-distributed servers with the possibility of scaling; - geo-distributed array of hot, conditionally hot, cold wallets, as well as addresses with a multisignature for each cryptocurrency; - a background clearing system that checks the correctness of current balances and I/Os between full cross-sections, and when a discrepancy registers a dangerous state, it transfers funds to cold wallets and multisignature addresses.
